original_title: Cat in the Hat: Ocean Commotion
overview: A brand new adventure, underwater we'll go, With the Cat and his friends in the ocean below! Swim with baby seahorses; cool down with some ice, learn tricks from sea creatures, now won't that be nice? And go deep deep down in the ocean so blue, Where the Cat and his friends are waiting for you!
tagline: The Cat and his friends in the ocean below!
title: Cat in the Hat: Ocean Commotion
